UniBO Spikeball

Bologna, Italy

About

Student-run Spikeball club at University of Bologna. Weekly sessions and university tournaments.

Features

Beginner FriendlyEquipment ProvidedOutdoor

Frequently Asked Questions

Contact UniBO Spikeball directly through their website or email. They're located in Bologna and welcome new members.
